org.apache.wink.server.utils
Interface SingleLinkBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
BaseLinksBuilder<SingleLinkBuilder>
public interface SingleLinkBuilder
extends BaseLinksBuilder<SingleLinkBuilder>

A builder for generating a single link to a resource. The link is created absolute or relative to the base uri according to the configuration or request settings.

Method Summary
 SingleLinkBuilder rel(String rel)
          Set the rel attribute of the link
